work.name: mi|im
work.summary: Developed and deployed two Angular web applications, now used daily by around 20 internal users. Designed and implemented a comprehensive test suite with Jasmine and Cypress for unit and end-to-end testing, integrated with CircleCI to streamline the CI/CD pipeline, improving deployment speed and reliability. Developed RESTful API endpoints using Java and PostgreSQL, enabling seamless communication between back-end services and front-end applications. Automated infrastructure provisioning and deployment using Terraform, leveraging AWS S3 and CloudFront for static website hosting. Enhanced data processing efficiency by implementing a trajectory similarity algorithm in Python. Contributed to system reliability through on-call support, diagnosing and resolving errors and performance issues to maintain optimal system health.

internships.name: Akamai
internships.summary: Optimized server allocation across geographic regions by implementing a bin packing heuristic to improve resource utilization. Built a data pipeline for comparing and analyzing real-time and forecasted traffic data using Python, SQL, and Bash, enabling data-driven decision-making. Developed knee detection algorithms to estimate cache space requirements for specific content classes, leveraging cache hit graphs to optimize resource allocation.

internships.name: ngram health
internships.summary: Created augmented reality (AR) scenes using A-Frame, designed as digital pet therapy to enhance the well-being of elderly individuals. Designed and optimized 3D assets in Blender for use in AR environments, ensuring high-quality and engaging user experiences.

internships.name: InstaDeep
internships.summary: Conducted a literature review on the 3D bin packing problem, summarizing recent advancements and key methodologies. Implemented optimization heuristics in Python to enhance volume utilization in existing 3D bin packing algorithms.

research.name: COMMIT Group (MIT CSAIL)
research.summary: Researched regular expression matching algorithms and optimization techniques used by engines like RE2 and Hyperscan, identifying key improvements for performance. Developed a high-performance regular expression library in C++ using multi-stage programming with BuildIt, optimizing matching speed and efficiency.
